Year: 2014 
Production: United States / Classic Media Productions, DreamWorks Animation 
Genre: Animation, Fantasy, Comedy, Adventure, Family 

Description: 
Mr. Peabody - businessman, inventor, scientist and Nobel Prize winner, gourmet, two-time Olympic champion and a genius ... which among other things is a dog. With the help of his most extraordinary inventions - machines VEYBEK - Mr. Peabody and his stepson Sherman instantly move into the past, where witnessing the most important historical events and interact with famous historical characters. But when Sherman fouls time travel, our heroes have to hit the road again - this time in order to restore the chain of historical events and the future salvation. In addition, Mr. Peabody has to cope with the most difficult task for him - to be a real father to Sherman. 

Director: Rob Minkoff / Rob Minkoff 
Producer: Denise Nolan Kaskinen, Alex Schwartz, Jason Clarke 
Actors: Ty Burell, Max Charles, Ariel Winter, Stephen Colbert, Leslie Mann, Allison Janney, Stanley Tucci, Tom McGrath, Lake Bell, Zach Callison
